Class SupportController

java.lang.Object
com.backend.backend.controller.SupportController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class SupportController extends Object
Controller to handle all Support and Feedback related operations. Segregates endpoints for generic users (Students) and Administrators.

      public SupportController()

  • Method Details

    • createTicket

      @PostMapping("/support") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SupportResponseDto> createTicket(@RequestBody SupportRequestDto requestDto)
      Endpoint for students to create a new support ticket. * @param requestDto Contains the subject and the message/query from the user.
      Returns:
      The created ticket details including the generated Ticket ID and status (OPEN).

    • getMyTickets

      @GetMapping("/support/my-tickets") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SupportResponseDto>> getMyTickets()
      Endpoint for the logged-in user to view their own ticket history. Useful for tracking the status of their previous queries. * @return List of support tickets belonging specifically to the current user.

    • getAllTickets

      @GetMapping("/admin/support") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SupportResponseDto>> getAllTickets()
      Endpoint for Administrators to view all support tickets in the system. Ordered by creation date (newest first). * @return List of all tickets from all users.

    • resolveTicket

      @PutMapping("/admin/support/{id}/reply") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SupportResponseDto> resolveTicket(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody SupportReplyDto replyDto)
      Endpoint for Administrators to reply to a specific ticket. This action will: 1. Update the 'adminReply' field in the database. 2. Change the status from 'OPEN' to 'RESOLVED'. 3. Trigger an email notification to the student. * @param id The ID of the ticket to resolve.
      Parameters:
      replyDto - Contains the admin's reply message.
      Returns:
      The updated ticket details.
